description: This file defines a networks service with functions to list, retrieve, create, update, and delete network resources via API calls. It acts as a client-side interface for interacting with network management endpoints.

methods.name: list()
methods.description: Fetches a list of all networks using a GET request to /networks.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific network by ID via GET request to /networks/:id.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new network with provided payload through POST request to /networks.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing network identified by ID with new data via PUT request to /networks/:id.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a network identified by ID via DELETE request to /networks/:id.
